page.title: 01SOUTH CAVE - A FARMING AREA
page.content: { EDUCATION. One primary school. EMPLOYMENT. Most residents commute into Hull or Beverley. ENTERTAINMENT. Mostly outside South Cave. There is a modern sports centre. FARMING. Main local employment. HOUSING.A mixture of old and modern. LANDSCAPE. The whole of South Cave covers an area of 5835 acres. TRADE. A few local food shops but important items are bought out of the village. TRANSPORT.A daily service to Hull and Goole and twice a week to Beverley. {South Cave} is close to the A63 which links to the M62. It is 8 miles west of the port of Hull and 8 miles south west of the market town of Beverley. It is also close to the east coast and the Humber Bridge.
